inclusion.criterion: Severe carotid artery stenosis (unilateral stenosis > 70%) diagnosed according to angiography
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: angiography revealed an 80% stenosis of the R ICA and a 90% L ICA stenosis

inclusion.criterion: Provision of informed consent regarding trial procedure
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Severe cardiovascular, hepatic, renal, or blood system diseases
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Hemorrhagic disease or unable to receive anticoagulation or antiplatelet aggregation
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 74M hx of CAD s/p CABG, EF 60% prior CVA (no residual deficits), HTN, HL, DMII, Moderate to Severe PVD was referred to cardiology for evaluation of PVD
